channel.title: Text typed (location)
channel.description: You know when you type something into your client, it will appear at the bottom of the screen in white text so you can check if you made any mistakes, etc. How would you move this to the top of the client screen? Ive been looking through mudclient, I am sure its in there, But not entirely sure. :S

item.title: Text typed (location)
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

[quote=“vizi0n, post:23, topic:286274”][quote author=liquidazer link=topic=378611.msg2848463#msg2848463 date=1246405063]
I found out how to do it, its in the mudclient.

Look:

private final void drawGameMenu() {
    gameMenu = new Menu(gameGraphics, 10);
    messagesHandleType2 = gameMenu.method159(5, 269, 502, 56, 1, 20, true);
    chatHandle = gameMenu.method160(7, 354, 498, 14, 1, 80, false, true);
    messagesHandleType5 = gameMenu.method159(5, 269, 502, 56, 1, 20, true);
    messagesHandleType6 = gameMenu.method159(5, 269, 502, 56, 1, 20, true);
    gameMenu.setFocus(chatHandle);
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 05:39:43 pm[/size][hr]Now im looking for how to move the remove buttons on the friendslist  :P

[/quote]

OMG I LOVE YOU! but i dont know what to change in order to get the typed text at the top of the screen …[/quote]

Fool around with it a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Text typed (location)
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

[quote=“Jessekinss, post:14, topic:286274”][quote author=adu link=topic=378611.msg2848754#msg2848754 date=1246415137]

WHY would you want to remove the “remove” button on the friends list?

Well um obviously you cannot read your own statements. You asked why do I want to remove the “remove” buttons from the friends list. Infact I do not want to remove them I just want to move them to a different location. Figured it out myself anyway, peace out loser.

And moving the button is “LOL” funny?

Read MY own statement? I’m pretty sure it was your idiotic idea to “MOVE” the remove button.

Maybe hes trying to redesign the GUI?

[/quote]

If he can’t find out how to move a button I highly doubt he can do anything with java.[/quote]

True >.<

item.description:
@Divinity wrote:

I think he means:
English:
Mudclient > When you type something ingame without pressing enter you can see what you type in a white text. liquidazer is asking how he can change the position of the white text (shown in picture below) to the top of the client, or tips on re-arrangement.

Picture:

Normally I would help but i haven’t touched RSCD source code in over 8 months. Also, I do not have it downloaded on my computer.
